p: Finally, another anti-HSV agent is brivudine (BVDU), a pyrimidine analog that acts as a prodrug, phosphorylated by viral thymidine kinase only and thus targeting the viral DNA polymerase ( Wilhelmus, 2015). This compound has been proven to be efficacious against HSV-1 and at least as effective as acyclovir in the treatment of HSV-1 infection ( Chou and Hong, 2014). Currently, is mainly used in different countries for treatment of VZV infections ( De Clercq, 2019).
